00029 #define BOOST_XINT_RAWINT_TPL template <bitsize_t Bits, bool Secure, class \
00030     Alloc>
00031 #define BOOST_XINT_RAWINT raw_integer_t<Bits, Secure, Alloc>

00033 BOOST_XINT_RAWINT_TPL
00034 class raw_integer_t {
00035     public:
00036     typedef magnitude_manager_t<Bits, Secure, Alloc> datatype;
00037     typedef base_divide_t<BOOST_XINT_RAWINT> divide_t;
00038 
00039     size_t length;
00040     bool negative;
00041 
00042     raw_integer_t(): length(1), negative(false), changed(false) { }
00043     raw_integer_t(const BOOST_XINT_RAWINT& copy): length(copy.length),
00044         negative(copy.negative), changed(false), data(copy.data) { }
00045     template <bitsize_t B, bool S, class A>
00046     raw_integer_t(const raw_integer_t<B,S,A>& copy): length(copy.length),
00047         negative(copy.negative), changed(true), data(copy.data) { make_unique();
00048         if (length > max_length()) length = max_length();
00049         trim(); }
00050     raw_integer_t(const BOOST_XINT_RAWINT& copy, bool neg, bool allow_zero =
00051         false): length(copy.length), negative(neg), changed(false),
00052         data(copy.data) { trim(allow_zero); }
00053     template <typename T>
00054     raw_integer_t(T n, size_t prealloc = 0, typename boost::enable_if<
00055         boost::is_integral<T> >::type* = 0): length(1), negative(false),
00056         changed(false) { if (std::numeric_limits<T>::is_signed) set_signed(n,
00057         prealloc); else set_unsigned(n, false, prealloc); }
00058     raw_integer_t(const char *s, size_t base = 10): length(1), negative(false),
00059         changed(false) { from_string(s, base); }
00060     raw_integer_t(const std::string& s, size_t base = 10): length(1),

00062     raw_integer_t(const xint::binary_t b, size_t bits = 0): length(1),
00063         negative(false), changed(false) { from_binary(b, bits); }

00065     BOOST_XINT_RAWINT& operator=(const BOOST_XINT_RAWINT& set) { length =
00066         set.length; negative = set.negative; data = set.data; return *this; }

00068     digit_t *digits(size_t resize, realloc::strategy strategy = realloc::copy);
00069     const digit_t *digits() const { return data.digits(); }

00071     digit_t get_digit(size_t i) const { return (i < max_length() ? digits()[i] :
00072         0); }

00074     digit_t operator[](size_t i) const { return get_digit(i); }

00077         data.same_storage(n.data); }
00078 
00079     int sign() const { return negative ? -1 : is_zero() ? 0 : 1; }
00080     int sign(bool allow_signed_zero) const { return (!allow_signed_zero &&
00081         is_zero() ? 0 : negative ? -1 : 1); }
00082     bool is_zero() const { return (length == 1 && digits()[0] == 0); }
00083     bool is_odd() const { return (digits()[0] & 0x01) != 0; }
00084     bool is_even() const { return (digits()[0] & 0x01) == 0; }
00085     size_t hex_digits() const { return (log2(*this) + 3) / 4; }
00086     raw_integer_t abs() const { return raw_integer_t(*this, false); }
00087     raw_integer_t negate() const { return raw_integer_t(*this, !negative); }

00150 BOOST_XINT_RAWINT_TPL
00151 digit_t *BOOST_XINT_RAWINT::digits(size_t resize, realloc::strategy strategy) {
00152     data.resize_and_uniquify(resize, strategy);
00153     if (resize == 0 || resize > data.max_length()) resize = data.max_length();
00154     if (strategy != realloc::copy) {
00155         if (length < resize) {
00156             if (strategy == realloc::extend) {
00157                 digit_t *d = data.digits(), *p = d + length, *pe = d + resize;
00158                 while (p != pe) *p++ = 0;
00159             }
00160             length = resize;
00161         } else if (length > data.max_length()) length = data.max_length();
00162     } else if (length > data.max_length()) length = data.max_length();
00163     changed = true;
00164     return data.digits();
00165 }
00166 
00167 BOOST_XINT_RAWINT_TPL
00168 void BOOST_XINT_RAWINT::set_signed(boost::intmax_t n, size_t prealloc) {
00169     if (n >= 0) {
00170         if (n <= digit_mask) {
00171             length = 1;
00172             negative = false;
00173             if (prealloc != 0) {
00174                 digits(prealloc, realloc::zero)[0] = static_cast<digit_t>(n);
00175             } else {
00176                 digits(1, realloc::ignore)[0] = static_cast<digit_t>(n);
00177             }
00178             trim();
00179         } else set_unsigned(n, false, prealloc);
00180     } else if (n == (std::numeric_limits<boost::intmax_t>::min)()) {
00181         // Have to treat the minimum number carefully, because -n is not
00182         // what you'd think it is.
00183         set_unsigned(-(n + 1), true, prealloc);
00184         --*this;
00185     } else set_unsigned(-n, true, prealloc);
00186 }
00187 
00188 BOOST_XINT_RAWINT_TPL
00189 void BOOST_XINT_RAWINT::set_unsigned(boost::uintmax_t n, bool neg, size_t
00190     prealloc)
00191 {
00192     if (n <= digit_mask) {
00193         length = 1;
00194         if (prealloc != 0) {
00195             digits(prealloc, realloc::zero)[0] = static_cast<digit_t>(n);
00196         } else {
00197             digits(1, realloc::ignore)[0] = static_cast<digit_t>(n);
00198         }
00199     } else {
00200         digit_t *d = digits((std::max)(digits_in_uintmax, prealloc),
00201             realloc::ignore), *i = d, *ie = i + max_length();
00202         while (n != 0 && i != ie) {
00203             *i++ = static_cast<digit_t>(n);
00204             n >>= bits_per_digit;
00205         }
00206         length = (i - d);
00207     }
00208     negative = neg;
00209     trim();
00210 }
00211 
00212 BOOST_XINT_RAWINT_TPL
00213 void BOOST_XINT_RAWINT::trim(bool allow_negative_zero) {
00214     assert(length <= max_length());
00215 
00216     bool zero = false;
00217     if (changed) {
00218         data.trim();
00219         if (length > 1) {
00220             digit_t *d = data.digits(), *i = d + length - 1;
00221             if (*i == 0) {
00222                 do { --i; } while (i > d && *i == 0);
00223                 length = size_t(i - d) + 1;
00224                 if (i == d && *i == 0) zero = true;
00225             }
00226         } else if (data.digits()[0] == 0) zero = true;
00227         changed = false;
00228     } else if (length == 1 && data.digits()[0] == 0) zero = true;
00229     if (zero && !allow_negative_zero) negative = false;
00230 }
00231 
00232 BOOST_XINT_RAWINT_TPL
00233 void BOOST_XINT_RAWINT::_swap(BOOST_XINT_RAWINT& i2) {
00234     using std::swap;
00235     swap(length, i2.length);
00236     swap(negative, i2.negative);
00237     swap(changed, i2.changed);
00238     swap(data, i2.data);
00239 }

00244 BOOST_XINT_RAWINT_TPL
00245 void swap(BOOST_XINT_RAWINT& i1, BOOST_XINT_RAWINT& i2) {
00246     i1._swap(i2);
00247 }

00249 template <typename charT, typename traits, bitsize_t Bits, bool Secure, class \
00250     Alloc>
00251 inline std::basic_ostream<charT,traits>& operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT,
00252     traits>& out, const BOOST_XINT_RAWINT n)
00253 {
00254     int base=((out.flags() & std::ios::hex) ? 16
00255         : (out.flags() & std::ios::oct) ? 8
00256         : 10);
00257     bool upperCase=(out.flags() & std::ios::uppercase ? true : false);
00258 
00259     int nsign = (n.is_zero() ? 0 : n.negative ? -1 : 1);
00260     if ((out.flags() & std::ios::showpos) && nsign >= 0) out << "+";
00261 
00262     if (out.flags() & std::ios::showbase) {
00263         if (nsign < 0) out << "-";
00264 
00265         if (base == 16 && upperCase) out << "0X";
00266         else if (base == 16) out << "0x";
00267         else if (base == 8) out << "0";
00268 
00269         out << to_string(n.abs(), base, upperCase);
00270     } else {
00271         out << to_string(n, base, upperCase);
00272     }
00273     return out;
00274 }
00275 
00276 template <typename charT, typename traits, bitsize_t Bits, bool Secure, class \
00277     Alloc>
00278 inline std::basic_istream<charT,traits>& operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT,
00279     traits>& in, BOOST_XINT_RAWINT& n)
00280 {
00281     int hex=(in.flags() & std::ios::hex) ? 1 : 0;
00282     int dec=(in.flags() & std::ios::dec) ? 1 : 0;
00283     int oct=(in.flags() & std::ios::oct) ? 1 : 0;
00284     int count=hex+dec+oct;
00285 
00286     size_t base=autobase;
00287     if (count == 1) {
00288         if (hex) base = 16;
00289         else if (oct) base = 8;
00290         else base = 10;
00291     } else if (count > 1) base = 10;
00292     // else auto-base
00293 
00294     std::string s;
00295     if (in.peek()=='+') {
00296         in.ignore();
00297     } else if (in.peek()=='-') {
00298         in.ignore();
00299         s.push_back('-');
00300     }
00301 
00302     if (base==autobase) {
00303         if (in.peek()=='0') {
00304             in.ignore();
00305             int c=in.peek();
00306             if (c=='x' || c=='X') {
00307                 in.ignore();
00308                 base=16;
00309             } else base=8;
00310         } else base=10;
00311     }
00312 
00313     while (in) {
00314         int c=in.peek();
00315         if ((base==8 && (c>='0' && c<='7')) ||
00316             (base==10 && (c>='0' && c<='9')) ||
00317             (base==16 && ((c>='0' && c<='9') || (c>='a' && c<='f') ||
00318                 (c>='A' && c<='F'))))
00319         {
00320             in.ignore();
00321             s.push_back(char(c));
00322         } else break;
00323     }
00324 
00325     try {
00326         n.from_string(s, base);
00327     } catch (std::exception&) {
00328         // Catch invalid strings
00329         in.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
00330     }
00331 
00332     return in;
00333 }
